data.title: SnooZzZzZz...
data.solution:
def v(s):
    return sum([int(i) * pow(60, 2 - idx) for idx,i in enumerate(s.split(':'))])

t = v(input())
p = v(input())
a = v(input())
s = int(input())
m = int(input())

r = a + p + (s * m * 60)

print("No" if r >= t else ["No", "Yes"][t - r >= 15 * 60])
data.statement: You have to be at the railway station at least {{15}} minutes before the train leaves, you also really enjoy sleeping. Given the time the train leaves [[T]], the time you need to get to the station [[P]], after you leave the bed, the time of  your alarm clock [[A]], the count of times you hit snooze on the alarm [[S]] and the snooze interval [[M]], output {{Yes}} if you'll catch the train, {{No}} otherwise.
data.stubGenerator:
read t:string(128)
read p:string(128)
read a:string(128)
read s:int
read m:int
write Yes/No
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> [[T]] string, the time [[HH]]{{:}}[[MM]]{{:}}[[SS]] the train leaves.
<<Line 2:>> [[P]] string, the time [[HH]]{{:}}[[MM]]{{:}}[[SS]] period you need to get to the station.
<<Line 3:>> [[A]] string, the time [[HH]]{{:}}[[MM]]{{:}}[[SS]] to which your alarm clock is set.
<<Line 4:>> [[S]] integer, the count of snoozes you've performed.
<<Line 5:>> [[M]] integer, the snooze minutes of your alarm clock.
data.outputDescription: {{Yes}} if you'll catch the train, {{No}} otherwise

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You have to be at the railway station at least 15 minutes before the train leaves, you also really enjoy sleeping. Given the time the train leaves T, the time you need to get to the station P, after you leave the bed, the time of your alarm clock A, the count of times you hit snooze on the alarm S and the snooze interval M, output Yes if you'll catch the train, No otherwise.
Input
Line 1: T string, the time HH:MM:SS the train leaves.
Line 2: P string, the time HH:MM:SS period you need to get to the station.
Line 3: A string, the time HH:MM:SS to which your alarm clock is set.
Line 4: S integer, the count of snoozes you've performed.
Line 5: M integer, the snooze minutes of your alarm clock.
Output
Yes if you'll catch the train, No otherwise
Constraints
If you're at the station 14 minutes and 59 seconds before the train leaves, you're late.
00 ≤ HH < 24
00 ≤ MM,SS < 60
0 ≤ S < 20
0 ≤ M < 60
Example
Input
10:00:00
01:00:00
08:50:00
2
10
Output
No
